Internal systems connecting to known or.Action: Identify IP addresses associated with known/suspected compromised third-party network devices from Threat Intelligence feeds. Filter Zeek conn.log and http.log for connections originating from or destined to these IPs. Analyze http.log for unusual User Agents, GET/POST requests, or payloads downloaded/uploaded. Use correlation analysis to identify internal systems communicating frequently with these suspect external IPs.

Connections or scanning activity origina.Action: Ingest Threat Intelligence feeds listing IP addresses of known/suspected compromised network devices. Filter Zeek conn.log and scan.log for connection attempts or scanning activity originating from these listed IPs targeting our network. Analyze connection patterns and frequency using descriptive statistics or time series analysis to identify abnormal reconnaissance or connection attempts.
